about.description: I am a Data Scientist currently pursuing my Master's degree in Naples, Italy. With a strong foundation in both Data Science and Computer Engineering, I specialize in building end-to-end machine learning solutions. My expertise lies in NLP, Deep Learning, and statistical analysis. I have experience integrating models into production and developing robust evaluation pipelines.
